rows.label: qst201512_msg0002
rows.name:
Now, you will tell us how to stop
this thing, won't you?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0003
rows.name:
Ahahaha! You idiots!
There ain't a snowball's chance
I'll ever tell you!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0004
rows.name:
And anyway, it's already been set in
motion. Ain't no one gonna stop it now!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0005
rows.name:
Oh I see. Then we'll just have to
publicize your deeds to the world,
won't we?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0006
rows.name: What...?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0007
rows.name:
Transportation of illegal substances
through black market avenues,
bribery, coercion...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0008
rows.name:
And I'm sure you used all sorts of
underhanded methods besides to
get your way.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0009
rows.name: Uh, hold on...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0010
rows.name:
Or, I know! Why don't you take a little
swig of Thanatitan? Just a little sip.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm sure you're very well acquainted
with its effects.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0012
rows.name: No, don't! You wouldn't! S-stop!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0013
rows.name:
You want me to stop? But you've
made so very much of it...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0014
rows.name:
It simply won't do unless you try
a sample for yourself...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0015
rows.name: Please! Stooooop!!!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0016
rows.name: Then how do we stop it?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0018
rows.name: All right then, down the hatch!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0019
rows.name:
Y-you have to operate the switches
in a specific order! Blue, white, blue!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0020
rows.name: ...Blue, white, blue, you say?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0021
rows.name:
That's right! That's what you wanted,
isn't it? So please, let me go! Please!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0022
rows.name:
You're sure? You wouldn't lie to your
dear auntie Azami, would you?

rows.label: qst201512_msg0023
rows.name: N-n-n-no, I would n-n-never...

rows.label: qst201512_msg0027
rows.name:
Wow, Azami. You really know how
to freak 'em out.

rows.label: qst201512_msg0028
rows.name:
Azami smile like smile of demon...
Tora shaking in boots!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0029
rows.name:
Now Tora know never to get on
wrong side of Azami!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0031
rows.name:
Well, now we know how to stop
this thing. It's time to put this
business to rest!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0032
rows.name: Yeah!

rows.label: qst201512_msg0033
rows.name: Right! Mo mo!
